name: The Shrine of Slime
description: The evil King Slime has built a dungeon in the middle of the woods claiming whoever could beat the trials within would get to keep his treasure. No one has emerged victorious thus far. But in steps YOU! A young adventurer destined to claim the dreaded King Slime's gold. Can you use you strength and wits to slay your enemies in this short, tactical RPG?  Or will you crumble in the heat of battle. Adventure calls, can you hear it? Do you have what it takes to defeat The Shrine of Slime?
